attributes.action: End UK government support for Saudi Arabia's war in Yemen
attributes.additional_details:
After President Biden announced the end of US support for Saudi Arabia's offensive in Yemen, the time has come for the Prime Minister to do the same. 

Billions of pounds worth of UK weapons are currently being used to create the biggest humanitarian crisis in history. Yemeni citizens face starvation, famine, a lack of education and sanitary facilities. 

More than 24 million people (80% of Yemen's population) require humanitarian assistance, according to UNICEF. The time to act is now.
attributes.background:
Review UK arms policy and immediately stop sales to Saudi Arabia
Review the technical help UK military officials provide to help the Saudi air force conduct an air campaign
Outline a commitment to protecting the human rights of civilians in Yemen
